description: Who will really call the shots in Cuba in the years to come? Here is a glance at some civilians and military figures who have Mr. Castro’s ear.
title: Raúl Castro’s Inner Circle
title_page: Raúl Castro’s Inner Circle  - The New York Times
text:
Raúl Castro has reconfigured Cuba’s socialist model and its geopolitical relations since he took over from his brother Fidel. But Raúl Castro has pledged to step down in 2018, and even those who track his circle closely are uncertain who will follow him in power.
Here is a glance at some of those who will have a voice in a post-Castro Cuba:
